name: PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions.user
description: The user property of the PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions dictionary is an object describing the user account for which the credentials are generated (via navigator.credentials.create()).

refs.name: Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1
refs.description: The definition of 'user' in the 'Web Authentication: An API for accessing Public Key Credentials Level 1' specification.
